Name: Geodude Torc
LongDescription: Speeds up the Pokémon's natural HP healing. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Geodude, Graveler, and Golem.  Finding a Geodude Torc at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
